alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 12:13AM EDT until August 24 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Huron County in north central Ohio... Eastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Eastern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1213 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Castalia, or near Sandusky, moving south at 20 mph. A second severe thunderstorm was located near Norwalk. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Norwalk, Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, New London, Plymouth, Green Springs, Northern Milan, Milan, Bloomville, Castalia, Greenwich, Monroeville, Attica, Bay View, North Fairfield, Republic, Flat Rock and Bloomingville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
